Class BeaconImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.ControllerIoImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.DeviceImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BeaconImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, Beacon, ControllerIO, Device, Storable
public class BeaconImpl extends DeviceImpl implements Beacon
A Beacon is a light which flashes toward oncoming traffic.
Author:
Douglas Lau, John L. Stanley - SRF Consulting
